definition: to grow/to nourish/to increase/to cause/juice/taste/(dialect) to spout/to spurt

sentences.english: Please help me to know where we can buy original Shiga chess or website of it ? Thankyou.
sentences.chinese: 請幫我知道我們可以買到原滋賀象棋或它的網站？

sentences.english: Then we with the mother moved back to live with my grandmother in Shiga prefecture.
sentences.chinese: 此後我們隨媽媽搬回外婆家住的滋賀縣。
